hepsim

Class HepSim

  • java.lang.Object
    • hepsim.HepSim

  • public class HepSim
extends Object
    Static class to handle HepSim data using URL.
    Author:
    S.Chekanov

    • Method Detail

      • getArray

        public static ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getArray(String file)
        Open a file to write/read objects to/from a file in sequential order. If "w" option is set, the old file will be removed. Use close() to flash the buffer and close the file.
        Parameters:
        file - input URL location of data sample.
        Returns:
        array with file names and sizes.

      • getList

        public static ArrayList<String> getList(String data)
        Return file list without sizes.
        Parameters:
        data - input URL location of data sample.
        Returns:
        list of files on the server without sizes.

      • getRanges

        public static List<Integer> getRanges(ArrayList<String> list,
                      String start,
                      String end)
        Return list with unique integer values from a given filelist. The names are identified by start and end strings. This is useful when using different pT and mass ranges. The output list will be sorted in increasing order.
        Parameters:
        list - initial list
        start - reg. expression for start string
        end - reg expression for end
        Returns:
        list of pT or mass ranges

      • getListArraySizes

        public static ArrayList<String[]> getListArraySizes(String data)
        Return file list with sizes.
        Parameters:
        data - input URL location of data sample.
        Returns:
        list of files on the server including file sizes.

      • getListSizes

        public static ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getListSizes(String data)
        Return file list with sizes.
        Parameters:
        data - input URL location of data sample.
        Returns:
        list with file names and their sizes.

      • isValidURL

        public static boolean isValidURL(String url)
        Veryfy URL

      • urlRedirector

        public static String urlRedirector(String surl)
        Smart URL redirector.
        Parameters:
        surl - URL of info page, or dataset name
        Returns:
        final download URL

        Generate error message.
